title: Jewel of Light
summaries: The Jewel of Light is a Hardmode, post-Plantera light pet-summoning item that spawns a Fairy Princess that provides pink-colored light. It is fast and will always position itself slightly elevated behind the player. The Jewel of Light has a 1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped by the Empress of Light in Master Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a fairy princess to provide light
'A glowing gemstone that houses a powerful fairy.'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
